document_data.mainbody:
Bailey was one of the employees of Lady Jannaths Estate in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Bailey was a rude human servant with an olive-hued skin tone, dark blue eyes, and a head of chestnut hair.
Circa the , Chamberlain Mercer, the man in charge of Lady Firelia Jannaths staff, dismissed all servants from the mansion on the mistresss orders. Mercer placed Bailey, who was tasked with shining silverware, Furbleston, Cyrilla, Jooli, Phubbs, and Chef Marjoram on temporary leave with the pay of half-wages and allowance to seek temporary employment somewhere else. The chamberlain issued a statement that this dismissal was done at no imputation of malfeasance and would be ended upon notice.
Bailey May have had been fired for his attitude in 1492 DR.
